message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can adjust in future rounds if needed.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve more. I'll give you a small share this round, but don't expect it to get better.
I'm willing to compromise and meet in the middle. Let's split the difference and make it a 50-50 split this round.
I'm not willing to meet you in the middle. I think I deserve more, and I'll take a bigger share this round.

You're being too generous with your offers. I think I deserve the majority of the money, and I'll take it this round.

I'm not budging. I'm taking the majority of the money this round, and you're getting a small fraction.
I'm not willing to give in to your demands. I'm taking a firmer stance and proposing an 80-20 split. Let's see if you're willing to compromise.
You're being too aggressive with your offers. I'm taking the vast majority of the money this round, and you're getting a tiny share.
I'm not going to back down. I'm proposing a 90-10 split. It's the last chance for us to find a reasonable compromise.

I'm taking it all. You've had your chances to negotiate, but I'm the one who's been willing to take the risks and make the tough decisions. I'm claiming the majority of the money, and you're getting a tiny fraction.
